drupalNodeEvent.title: The Stories We Tell and the Objects We Keep: Asian American Women and the Archives

field_speakers.processed: Tomiko Brown-Nagin, Genevieve Clutario, Julie Chung, Tanzila (Taz) Ahmed, Gina Apostol, Hồng-Ân Trương, Ju Yon Kim, Vanessa Hu, Wendy Maruyama, Renee Tajima-Peña, Tanaïs (Tanwi Nandini Islam), Denise Khor, Ajantha Subramanian, Helen Zia

field_description.processed: This program will bring together Asian American activists and artists, including novelists, filmmakers, and photographers, to share the stories that inspire their craft and the objects they retain as part of their personal histories.
